name: Living Idiot
description:
Living Idiot; a game made in 3 days for ludum dare 46

You are the mages helper as he unleashes evil upon the world but there seems to be a goblin infestation in the forest. Exterminate the goblins until the mage ends his summon don't let him or yourself die though.
Controls:

Arrow Keys to move 

space to hit sword

shift to slow down
